title: Years of Experience
subtitle: Our Experts
description: Aqal Engineering Solutions has a proven track record of delivering resilient and innovative projects across Somalia, combining decades of expertise with a passion for sustainability and cultural preservation.
items: Over 250 successful projects completed across Somalia.
Over 10 years of expertise in sustainable engineering and design.
Resilient housing and health centers built in urban and rural areas.
Partnerships with leading global organizations for development.
